name: 鄭以旋
objective: Students will acquire English competence to conduct business in the commercial world, including such areas as investment, finance, supply chain, marketing and sales, and risk management. Contemporary literature on world economies, free trade and capitalism will be read.

Attendance policy:
Seven or more absences from Week 3 onwards will result in a grade of 0% for the course.   

Assessment:
Mid-term* 　　　　　　　　　　25%
Final exam* 　　　　　　　　　　35%
Group presentation　　　　　　　　30%
Attendance and participation　　　　10%　　　　

* At the lecturer’s sole discretion, a make-up Mid-term or Final exam may be granted upon presentation of a valid proof of illness (medical certificate or record of hospitalization) within 10 days of the date of absence.
